Located in downtown Los Angeles, Yekra’s leadership comes from years of experience in the entertainment industry. We’ve bought films. We’ve sold films. We’ve made films. We understand the ins-and-outs of film distribution, and we’ve built a technology platform and marketing process carefully designed to reduce friction in selling and delivering content. That’s how we’ve brought millions of viewers to our films, and how we’ll bring millions more to an ever-expanding network of distributors and filmmakers.

We built this company because no-one else had got it right. The right solution demands not only good technology, but beautiful technology, interrupting technology. It needs industry experience, cutting-edge marketing tools and strategies. And it needs a local, Los Angeles staff, people you can collaborate with over coffee. That solution is Yekra.
